author: gnosticdev
description: A Bun plugin for generating typescript types for environment variables
name: bun-plugin-env-types

scripts.tag: git tag v$npm_package_version && git push origin v$npm_package_version
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish --access public && npm run tag
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish --access public && npm run tag
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish --access public && npm run tag
